name: As Seen on TV Hot Buns, Light Hair

reviews.name: As Seen on TV Hot Buns, Light Hair
reviews.reviewText: I never buy As seen on TV products, but so glad I did this time! This hair tool is fantastic & easy to use. Great for when Im in a rush, it takes 2 secs to make a bun and holds all day long. The only this that I dont like about the product is the elastic band thats connected to it. There is no reason for it. The product works ALOT BETTER without the elastic band. Using the elastic band made the bun terrible and made it fall down after a while. So I just dont use the elastic band and my bun is fine. Love this product!
reviews.title: Simple & Amazing! Love this product!

reviews.name: As Seen on TV Hot Buns, Light Hair
reviews.reviewText: I have a ton of curly, thick, wild hair. I used this product for a wedding and all I had to do was put my hair in a ponytail and follow the instructions. No bobby pins needed! I was shocked this worked considering I break hair accessories sometimes just trying to get my hair in them.
reviews.title: 12 June 2013

reviews.name: As Seen on TV Hot Buns, Light Hair
reviews.reviewText:
hot buns worked perfect and looks so professional. So pretty.
I have waist length hair & it looks beautiful. My husband thought
I just came from the beauty shop.
reviews.title: Great Hair Product

reviews.name: As Seen on TV Hot Buns, Light Hair
reviews.reviewText: This contraption isn't worth the money and doesn't work at all like shown on TV!!! I could get it to roll up, but the rubber band that's supposed to hold it isn't long enough to pull over the bun. By that time, the bun is all undone. I finally just threw it away. Last time I buy anything that is "as seen on TV". What a disappointment and waste of money!
reviews.title: Poor design!

reviews.name: As Seen on TV Hot Buns, Light Hair
reviews.reviewText: Hot Buns really work! They're fairly easy to use, and you don't even need to use the extra band. I have medium length, very fine hair, and these work just fine! The longer/thicker your hair, the better!! Good product!
reviews.title: They Really Work!
